moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bb5 Nf6 4. Bxc6: I was hesitant to trade, because I wanted to utilize my Queen and mate on the f7 square, but then I realized the positioning of my Knight would be sufficient.
moves.6... Nxf2: At this point, I didn't care about material loss.
moves.7. Qf3 Bb4+ 8. c3 Rb8: Why?? I guess he didn't see the mate.
